Reason: The configuration option 'gi.igi.samples' in the 'sunflow' software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value significantly impacts the rendering performance of the system. Increasing the number of samples can lead to longer rendering times and higher memory consumption, while decreasing the number of samples can result in faster rendering but potentially lower image quality. Therefore, any change in the 'gi.igi.samples' configuration can have a notable effect on system performance.
